text:
01 of 13 CHRIS KIRKPATRICK Courtesy Chris Kirkpatrick 'NSYNC has welcomed its newest honorary member! In October 2017, Kirkpatrick's wife gave birth to the couple's first child, son Nash Dylan. "We are both looking forward to becoming parents, and learning how much fun having a child will be," the former boy band member told PEOPLE back in March.

02 of 13 LIAM PAYNE Liam Payne/Instagram The One Direction member and his girlfriend, Cheryl, welcomed their first child together — a son — in March 2017. "I'm incredibly happy to welcome our new baby boy into the world, it's a moment that I will never forget for the rest of my life and my favourite memory I have so far," he captioned a photo of himself holding the newborn.

03 of 13 LOUIS TOMLINSON Louis Tomlinson/Instagram Louis Tomlinson became the first dad of his One Direction band mates, welcoming his son — Freddie Reign — with Briana Jungwirth on Jan. 21, 2016. "It's affected how I am as a person a little bit," Tomlinson said of fatherhood in an interview with SiriusXM. "I'd like to say it's made me a bit more mature — I don't know if that’s actually true."

04 of 13 JUSTIN TIMBERLAKE Instagram "Here's what I'll say — all I know is I don't know what the hell I did before," the 'NSYNC member said of raising 2-year-old son Silas with wife Jessica Biel. "It's an extremely humbling experience, and I've never had more poop on my person!"

05 of 13 NICK CARTER Source: Nick Carter/Instagram The Backstreet Boys member feeds his now-1-year-old son, Odin Reign, whom he welcomed with wife Lauren Kitt.

06 of 13 HOWIE DOROUGH Baby Face Portraits Dorough and his wife, Leigh Boniello, are parents to two sons — 8-year-old James and 4-year-old Holden, pictured here.

07 of 13 NICK LACHEY Vanessa Lachey/Instagram Lachey knows fatherhood all too well — the 98 Degrees frontman is dad to three kids with wife Vanessa: 5-year-old son Camden, 2-year-old daughter Brooklyn and 10-month-old son Phoenix. "[My wife Vanessa] and I always, in the back of our minds, wanted three kids. So here we are at three, and it’s awesome," Lachey told PEOPLE.

08 of 13 JEFF TIMMONS Jeff Timmons/Instagram The 98 Degrees member is father to three kids — teens Alyssa and son Jeffrey with ex-wife Trisha Sperry, and daughter Aria with current wife Amanda.

09 of 13 JOEY FATONE Joey Fatone/Instagram Pictured here with 16-year-old daughter Briahna, the 'NSYNC member, who is also dad to 7-year-old Kloey with wife Kelly, takes in a concert. "It was like starting over again," Fatone said of waiting a few years to have a second child. "Diapers, midnight feedings, all that. We hadn't done it in nine years."

10 of 13 KEVIN RICHARDSON Kevin Richardson/Instagram Dad of the year! The Backstreet Boys member takes his 10-year-old son Mason to the premiere of Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. Richardson and wife Kristin also share a second child together, 4-year-old son Maxwell.

11 of 13 DREW LACHEY https://www.instagram.com/p/4u9h9OOq56/?hl=en The 98 Degrees member and wife Lea are parents to two kids — 7-year-old son Hudson and 11-year-old Isabella.

12 of 13 BRIAN LITTRELL Brian Littrell/Instagram A member of the Backstreet Boys, Littrell has one son — 14-year-old Baylee, with wife Leighanne — who appeared in the Broadway show Disaster!.
title: Liam Payne, Louis Tomlinson: Boy Band Members with Babies

meta_data.description: See which boy band members are also dads
meta_data.sailthru.author: Grace Gavilanes
